name: Set Up Boxes
_source: s;Man2;Excuse me, you there.{w}{br}I know you're here to meet with Lord Roland, but could you please help me with something?
s;Man2;We're redecorating the hall soon, but the boxes are so heavy.{w}{br}You two look strong. Could you help me move them?
s;Man2;Oh, thank you! They're right this way.
s;Simon;Seems like an odd time to redecorate{w}{br}House Roland might need to work on its hospitality.
s;Anuki;Hey, these are kind of in the way.{w}{br}Are you sure you want these here if Roland is having guests?
s;Man2;Oh, I'm sure it'll be fine.{w}{br}New arrivals can just take the other way to the dining room.
s;Simon;So, do you think Roland is making a good impression on Morrissey's troops?
s;Anuki;If anyone tried this at father's place, I can't even imagine what'd happen.{w}{br}But oh well, it's Roland's funeral. Let's get moving.
